TEXT: Fufufu, do you want to fight a war along with me? NL We'll fight until we turn this planet to ash!
NL You burn the heart. Fufu, what a pretty sight!

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~violent~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
